cards.name: nails by michal
cards.description: nice and calm nail clinic. we offer good prices and great work. we have 3 workers
cards.longDescription: Welcome to the Nail Polish Clinic Business, where your nail dreams come to life. Our skilled technicians transform your nails into captivating works of art. With a spectrum of colors and designs, we pamper your hands and feet, creating stunning looks that leave a lasting impression. Elevate your style with every stroke of polish.

cards.name: Facial Treatment
cards.description: we offer our clients facial treatment with the best doctors out there. lowest price.
cards.longDescription: Experience the pinnacle of skincare indulgence at our Facial Treatment Business. Our expert clinicians combine advanced techniques and luxurious products to rejuvenate your skin. Unveil your natural radiance and address skincare concerns, all in a serene haven of relaxation and self-care.

cards.name: Make Up by sasha
cards.description: professional make up artist. with 4 years experience in make up for events and brides.
cards.longDescription: Step into the world of glamour with our Makeup Artist Business. Our creative artists craft personalized looks that accentuate your beauty and reflect your style. Whether it's a subtle elegance or a bold statement, we enhance your features and boost your confidence. Unveil your inner beauty through the artistry of makeup.
